pera	eelanga 2010 sita kataloniyawe palathbanda rajaya wisin gonpora thahanam karana ladi.namuth spanynyaye wyawasthanukula usawiya magin meya sanskruthika urumayak lesa nam kirimath samanga mehi athi thahanama da iwath kirimata nagi sitiya.namuth kataloniya rajaya meya sampurnayen hela dakina athara samaja katayuthu amathyawaraya pawasa aththe thama rajaya meya nawatha prathisthapanaya kirimata ida nodena bawayi.emenma sathwa hinsanaya ha minis marana sidu wimata kisi seth ida nothabana bawa ohu wadiduratath prakasha kala.kese wuwada janathawada mema mathayan dekatama noyek prathichara dakwana bawa aaranchiyi…

ema udarpana giwisuma athsan thabimata adalawa, aarakshaka amathyathuma washayen athigaru janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.

maha wihara wanshika shyamopali maha nikaye asgiri maha wihara parshwaye uththarithara mahanayaka, aithihasika rangiri dambaulu rajamaha wiharadhipathi, sahithya chakrawarthi, mahopadhyaya, aggamaha panditha, athigaurawarha udugama shri dhammadassi rathnapala buddharakkhithabhidhana maha swamindrayanan wahansege, 79 wana janma dinaya anusmaranaya karana ada dawase, subhashinsana paniwidayak nikuth karanu labanne hadapiri apramana bhakthiyakin ha gaurawayakini. 1930 marthu masa 17 wani dina janma labhaya labu mahanayaka maha swamindrayanan wahanse, wasara 57 k wani dirgha kalayak sasun ketha babalawamin itukala udara sewayata pujopaharayak kirimata meya awasthawak kara ganimi.
